Text: The Narita Airport Terminal 2 Shuttle System (成田空港第2ターミナルシャトルシステム , Narita Kūkō Dai-ni Tāminaru Shatoru Shisutemu ) was an automated people mover used in Narita International Airport, Narita, Chiba Japan.
